    <v-btn class="thInspectButton" @click="send({payload:true})" color="#fb7936" density="default" append-icon="mdi-code-braces"> Inspect </v-btn>
</template>

<style>
.thInspectButton{
    height: 10px !important;
    border-radius: 15px !important;
    top: -96px !important;
    left: -155px !important;
    width: 142px !important;
}
</style>

name: inspectCheck

rules.to: "A new NCD device with MAC ("&(data.addr)&") has been connected! You can select it from MAC Dropdown"

name: typeOfSelectedMAC
is type 4
func:
let unit = {
    groups: 
    { 
        hide: 
        [
            "ncd-thermocouple:thInspect1",
            "ncd-thermocouple:thInspect2",
            "ncd-thermocouple:thInspect3",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th2ChTempGauge1",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th2ChTempChart1",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th2ChTempGauge2",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th2ChTempChart2",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th3ChTempGauge1",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th3ChTempChart1",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th3ChTempGauge2",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th3ChTempChart2",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th3ChTempGauge3",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th3ChTempChart3"
        ],
        show:
        [
            "ncd-thermocouple:th1ChTempGauge",
            "ncd-thermocouple:th1ChTempChart",
            "ncd-thermocouple:thBatteryGauge",
            "ncd-thermocouple:thBatteryChart"

        ],
        enable:
        [
            "ncd-thermocouple:thSelectMac",
            "ncd-thermocouple:thDownload"
        ]
    } 
}
msg.payload = unit;
return msg;
